channel.title: CVE Feed for OSIsoft -- PI Data Archive
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSIsoft -- PI Data Archive

item.title: CVE-2020-10600|2024-08-04T11:06:10.143Z -- osisoft -- pi%20data%20archive
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker could crash PI Archive Subsystem when the subsystem is working under memory pressure. This can result in blocking queries to PI Data Archive (2018 SP2 and prior versions).
